title: John Carpenter Sued Luc Besson For Ripping Off ‘Escape From New York’ — And Won!
text:
John Carpenter Sued Luc Besson For Ripping Off ‘Escape From New York’ — And Won! 
Published By: Uproxx - Yesterday 
It would’ve been hard to watch 2012’s Lockout (produced by Luc Besson’s Europacorp) — in which an unjustly convicted prisoner played...
